title: SError
description:
SError is an XDR Struct defines as:

```text struct Error { ErrorCode code; string msg<100>; }; ```

ErrorCode.description:
ErrorCode is an XDR Enum defines as:

```text enum ErrorCode { ERR_MISC = 0, // Unspecific error ERR_DATA = 1, // Malformed data ERR_CONF = 2, // Misconfiguration error ERR_AUTH = 3, // Authentication failure ERR_LOAD = 4  // System overloaded }; ```
